title: Ticket #4515: windows queue issues
description:
In trying to see jobs lost by hand, several things seen. If you have 10 sleep jobs from a queue 10and bounce the schedd down then up, sometimes the jobs appear still running and sometimes idle again.(condor_off -fast -schedd/condor_on -schedd

With the same 4 running(sleep 0), when I rebooted when condor came back after the reboot, there were 8 jobs in the run state(4 slots) when I rebooted again, all 10 were running.
